title: Walk Into Your Good Night - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Love at First Sight   Modern Day   Past Trauma   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Seme Protagonist   Slow Romance   Straight Uke   Terminal Illness   Unrequited Love
author: Qin Sanjian   秦三见
description: “For those past days I seemed to be in a long night. Carrying a whole body of moonlight, he tore a crack open in my darkness, and gently walked into my good night.”>
